data.sql: create temporary table temp select SUM(Hours) AS Individual_Total_Hours, PersonnelNo, Name, CostCenter from CDT where PersonnelNo != '#' and PersonnelNo not in (select EmployeeNo from LeftEmp) GROUP BY PersonnelNo, Name, CostCenter;
create temporary table temp2 select temp.Individual_Total_Hours, temp.PersonnelNo, temp.Name, temp.CostCenter, CC.Manager from temp inner join CC on temp.CostCenter=CC.CostCenter
select *, (Individual_Total_Hours / target_hours) AS UR from temp2 where CostCenter = (select CostCenter from CC limit %s,1) order by UR limit 5;
